channel.title: MAI on Adrian G. Zucco
channel.description: Recent content in MAI on Adrian G. Zucco

item.title: Evidence Based Clinical Application of Personalised Medicine
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: Guest lecturer in medical Artificial Intelligence and Real-World Evidence sessions since 2022. Course held in fall under the Master in Precision Medicine at the University of Copenhagen.

item.title: Data Doctors
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: Founder of a decentralized community for learning Data Science among medical practictioners at Righospitalet. I created multiple open-access workshops to teach the basics of Data Science in R.
